how to set up LAN interface in ubuntu 11: it should be as simple as plug in the cable and it works. if not you may need to click on the detwork icon (near the clock. look for tooltips) and do some manual config
I am not sure if there is any manual for 11.04 net config. but ubuntu.com would be  agood place to look.
generally you should be able to muddle your way through if you have a basic knowledge of network setup. it is fairly straight forward
